title: Easy chocolate fudge layer cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '80g cocoa powder', '7 tablespoons boiling water', '110g baking spread or butter', '300g golden caster sugar', '3 large eggs', '5 tablespoons whole milk', '180g self-raising flour', '1 generous teaspoon baking powder', 'For the buttercream', '250g unsalted butter, softened', '500g icing sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '80g cocoa powder', '100g double cream or whole milk']
